  1. Description
  2. Classes and Interfaces

Package ui

package ui
  • Class
    Description
    BuyingScreen
    The BuyingScreen class represents the interactive UI screen where users can input an amount of shares to buy in the simulation.
    DayTradingBuyingScreen
    Represents the screen where users can buy shares during day trading simulations.
    DayTradingScreen
    Represents the screen for day trading simulation.
    DayTradingSearchScreen
    The DayTradingSearchScreen class represents the screen where users can search for a stock ticker, load from CSV, confirm, or exit—with your new cohesive UI: animated gradient, stock-themed background image overlay, pill-shaped buttons with hover scaling, and click-flash feedback.
    DayTradingSellingScreen
    The DayTradingSellingScreen class represents the user interface screen where users can sell shares in the day trading simulation mode.
    DrawingSurface
    The DrawingSurface class is responsible for rendering the user interface of the application, handling user input, and managing the screen transitions.
    GraphingScreen
    The GraphingScreen class represents a screen that displays a graph with an animated gradient + stock-themed background overlay, plus pill-shaped, hover-scaled buttons for each action.
    InvestmentSearchScreen
    The InvestmentSearchScreen class represents the screen where users can search for a stock ticker, load from CSV, confirm, or exit—with your new cohesive UI: animated gradient, stock-themed background image overlay, pill-shaped buttons with hover scaling, and click-flash feedback.
    MainMenuScreen
    The MainMenuScreen class represents the main menu of the Stock Analyzer application with enhanced UI: stock-themed background image, animated gradient overlay, hover scaling, pill-shaped buttons, and emojis.
    Screen
    The Screen interface defines the contract for all screen classes in the application.
    SearchScreen
    The SearchScreen class represents the screen where users can search for a stock ticker, load from CSV, confirm, or exit—with your new cohesive UI: animated gradient, stock-themed background image overlay, pill-shaped buttons with hover scaling, and click-flash feedback.
    SellingScreen
    The SellingScreen class represents a UI screen where users can sell shares in the stock simulation.
    SimulationScreen
    Represents the screen for stock simulation.
    SimulationsScreen
    The SimulationsScreen class represents the simulations menu of the Stock Analyzer application with enhanced UI: stock-themed background image, animated gradient overlay, hover scaling, pill-shaped buttons, and emojis.
